name: Heroes of Might and Magic: A Strategic Quest
name_original: Heroes of Might and Magic: A Strategic Quest
description:
The realms of Might and Magic are expanding. New lands have been discovered and you must rise to the challenge of conquering them. Beware, for many warlords have risen to test your leadership and tactics. You must carefully manage all the resources at your disposal or you will surely be defeated.

Now is the time to recruit your heroes, gather your armies and lead them to victory!Reexperience the very beginning of the legendary saga A unique gameplay style and interesting story set in the famous Might and Magic universe A truly addictive combination of RPG and turn-based strategy elements
